All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ClockDisplay
An interface classes that displays the move counter and receive the pause/stop signals.
Constants
Some numeric constants.
PlayerTimeDisplay
Interface to be implemented by classes that want to display a player's time.
TimeBudgetConstraint
Constraints for the player's timing.
TimeControl
The time control which is the heart of this chess clock.
TimeControlPhase
The time control phase determines the amount of time a player has for a certain amount of moves.
In case the time budget is not limited to a certain amount of moves, the constant INF can be set for the move number.
